name: Sweet Garlic Chicken
description: Indulge in a high-protein, low-carb meal with our Sweet Garlic Chicken recipe. Perfect for those seeking a healthy yet delicious twist on chicken, this recipe combines the robust flavors of garlic and coconut sugar with chicken thighs to create a dish that's not only nutritious but also rich in taste and perfect for health-conscious food lovers.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the chicken thighs under cold water, then pat dry with paper towels.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, combine the minced garlic, coconut sugar, salt, and ground black pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Rub the garlic mixture evenly onto both sides of the chicken thighs.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Place the seasoned chicken thighs on a baking tray lined with parchment paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes, or until the chicken is thoroughly cooked and has a golden brown exterior.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Let the chicken rest for a few minutes before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
